1.title: Cran-Broccoli Salad
1.instructions:
In a medium bowl, whisk together the vinegar, mustard, maple syrup, garlic, and lemon zest. Gradually whisk in the canola oil while drizzling in a fine stream.
In a serving bowl, combine the broccoli slaw, dried cranberries, and onion. Pour the dressing over, and toss to coat evenly. Chill for at least 15 minutes before serving. Sprinkle pecans over the top just before serving.

ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) jar artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
2.title: Tuna-Artichoke Salad
2.instructions: Mix artichoke hearts, dill, olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, and black pepper together in a bowl; add spinach, tuna, and red bell pepper and toss.

ingredients: 1 bunch kale, large stems discarded, leaves finely chopped
3.title: Kale and Feta Salad
3.instructions: Massage kale with salt in a large mixing bowl for 2 minutes. Pour vinegar over the kale and toss to coat. Fold apple, feta cheese, currants, and pine nuts into the kale.

4.title: Cranberry Waldorf
4.instructions: In a medium bowl, combine cranberries, apple, celery, grapes, raisins, walnuts, sugar, cinnamon, and yogurt. (I chop cranberries in a food processor, and it works great). Toss to coat. Cover, and chill 2 hours. Stir just before serving.

ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) bag baby spinach leaves, rinsed and drained
5.title: Spinach Pomegranate Salad
5.instructions: Place spinach in a salad bowl. Top with red onion, walnuts, feta, and sprouts. Sprinkle pomegranate seeds over the top, and drizzle with vinaigrette.
